game.name: RMF's Ragdoll Physics Experiments
game.shortDescription: A sprawling facility full of secrets, puzzles, and a voice that won’t stop commenting. Complete challenge rooms to unlock gadgets, discover more props and ragdolls, then turn it all into glorious sandbox disasters.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A sprawling facility full of secrets, puzzles, and a voice that won’t stop commenting. Complete challenge rooms to unlock gadgets, discover more props and ragdolls, then turn it all into glorious sandbox disasters.
game.publishers: Giraffe Head Studios, Rate My Funeral
